SEARCH
Package gutek.domain.revisions

Class RevisionStrategy<T extends CardBase>

java.lang.Object
gutek.domain.revisions.RevisionStrategy<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of CardBase that this strategy applies to
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegularTextModeRevisionStrategy, ReverseTextModeRevisionStrategy
public abstract class RevisionStrategy<T extends CardBase> extends Object
Represents an abstract revision strategy for handling card revisions in a spaced repetition system.

This class defines the structure and behavior common to all revision strategies, such as managing buttons for card revisions, tracking revision statistics, and determining the next revision date.

  • Field Details

    • getButtonsPaneFunction

      private final Function<T extends CardBase,javafx.scene.layout.Pane> getButtonsPaneFunction
      A function that generates a Pane containing buttons for card revision.

      This function is responsible for creating the user interface components that allow the user to interact with the cards during the revision process.

    • reviseCardFunction

      private final BiPredicate<javafx.scene.control.Button,T extends CardBase> reviseCardFunction
      A predicate function that performs the card revision and determines whether the revision is complete based on the button clicked during the revision process.

      The predicate takes a Button and a CardBase as inputs, performs the revision logic for the card, and returns true if the revision for the given card is considered finished. This function encapsulates both the action of revising the card and the evaluation of whether the revision session for the card should end.
